SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.json

Class GameRules

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.json.GameRules
public class GameRules extends Object
The GameRules class represents the game rules and provides access to various game-related settings and configurations.

    • getMaxSelectableTiles

      public int getMaxSelectableTiles()
      Returns the maximum number of selectable tiles. According to the rules of the game, it corresponds to 3.
      Returns:
      The maximum number of selectable tiles.
